title: Lucky, the Playful Kitten
description: Lucky can't resist chasing a butterfly - the most beautiful he's ever seen. But after a while, the kitten gets bored and realizes that he's lost. The next day, Lucky makes new friends. They all want to help him find his way home, but Lucky can't remember anything that would put them on the right trail. Will his friends finally stumble upon a clue that will reunite Lucky with his best friend Bobby just in time for Christmas? An amusing story with 18 beautiful colored pictures and extra fun stuff.
author: Jeannine Dufresne
